# MTLTessellationControlPointIndexType.none

**Case**

No size. This value should only be used when drawing patches without a control point index buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Index types

- **MTLTessellationControlPointIndexType.uint16**: The size of a 16-bit unsigned integer.
- **MTLTessellationControlPointIndexType.uint32**: The size of a 32-bit unsigned integer.

items.description: The size of a 16-bit unsigned integer.
items.name: MTLTessellationControlPointIndexType.uint16

items.description: The size of a 32-bit unsigned integer.
